ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: TEXT(Status) = 'Escalated' && scc_Billing_Number__c = null && $Profile.Name != 'Salesforce API Only System Integrations' &&(SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8809' || SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8808'|| SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8434') && !$Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration
